sentences.en: A squared rectangle is a rectangle dissected into at least two squares.
sentences.cn: 方化矩形是指可以分割成至少两个正方形的矩形.

sentences.en: A torus can be obtained from a rectangle by identifying opposite sides.
sentences.cn: 环面可由矩形把其两对对边分别重叠起来而得到.

sentences.en: Beitang irregular rectangle, surrounded by stacked rubble shore, Malus Halliana.
sentences.cn: 北塘呈不规则矩形, 四周叠石堆岸, 杨柳垂丝.

sentences.en: Cloth diaper may be folded in a triangle or a rectangle.
sentences.cn: 用布做的尿布可以叠成三角形或长方形.

sentences.en: Four - sided rectangle shape that can be customized by dragging any selection handle.
sentences.cn: 可通过拖动任一选择手柄来自定义的四边矩形.

sentences.en: He handed me a little rectangle of white paper.
sentences.cn: 他递给我一张小小的长方形白纸片。

sentences.en: It is actually this rectangle that you drag to another element.
sentences.cn: 实际上是将这个矩形拖放到另一个元素。

sentences.en: Rectangle - shape side gate and the gear - rack taking off thread mechanism were used.
sentences.cn: 采用矩形侧浇口、齿轮齿条脱螺纹机构.

sentences.en: She could see into the tight, crowded rectangle of the French Quarter.
sentences.cn: 她可以看到那熙熙攘攘 、 拥挤不堪的长方形法国居民区.

sentences.en: Suppose the width of a rectangle is seven meters.
Suppose the width of a rectangle is x metres.
The area of a rectangle is the product of the lengths of two adjacent sides.
sentences.cn: 长方形的面积是相邻两边的长的乘积.

sentences.en: The constituent squares in a squared rectangle have commensurable sides.
sentences.cn: 在方化矩形中,组成矩形的各个正方形有可公度的边.

sentences.en: The rectangle clearly shows each separate class in the distribution.
sentences.cn: 矩形能够清晰地显示出各级分布状况.

sentences.en: This is shown as the hatched rectangle.
Truncates text that does not fit in the rectangle and adds ellipsis.
sentences.cn: 截断无法放入矩形框的文本并添加省略号.

sentences.en: Yes, it is like a rectangle.

trans.tran_en: a shape that has four straight sides, two of which are usually longer than the other two, and four 90˚ angles at the corners
